image_metadata.caption: A young man with short dark hair takes a mirrored selfie, wearing a casual washed-out t-shirt and a sling bag. He is holding a small black rectangular object up to his face, displaying a subtle smirk.

A young woman with a short dark bob, natural makeup, and a white button-up shirt over a tank top gazes upward, illuminated by a gentle light. A blurred yellow fish appears in the foreground, hinting at an aquarium setting.
A young man with dark, straight hair and round glasses smiles at the camera while making a peace sign. He is wearing a striped long-sleeve shirt in a casual setting.

physical_features: Pink polka dot bow cat-ear headband
image_metadata.caption: A young woman with long brown hair and blunt bangs poses in a close-up, wearing a playful pink polka dot bow cat-ear headband. She is dressed in a white ruffled top and has her finger gently touching her chin.
A young woman with long dark wavy hair and bangs takes a close-up selfie, wearing a pink houndstooth scarf. She has natural makeup and a slight smile.
A person with short black hair and bangs, wearing a white face mask, looks directly at the camera. The background shows blurry nighttime city lights through a window.

A person takes a full-body mirrored selfie, standing in what appears to be an elevator. They are dressed in a grey t-shirt, wide black pants, and black shoes, accessorized with a bracelet, rings, and a watch.

A man wearing a white t-shirt, loose light-wash jeans, and sneakers stands casually, leaning on a railing. He is wearing a tan baseball cap and dark-framed glasses, posing outdoors in front of a 'TVTE OF CHICAGO' sign with city buildings in the background under a cloudy sky.
A young man with dark, textured wavy hair and a clean-shaven face looks downwards and to the right. He is wearing a black t-shirt against a plain grey background, with clear lighting.

physical_features: White MagSafe ring on phone case
image_metadata.caption: A person takes a mirrored selfie, holding a black smartphone with a clear case and a white MagSafe ring. Their face is partially obscured by the phone and a brown baseball cap, though their eyes are visible.

A person with straight black hair and bangs is captured in a close-up selfie, leaning in with an open mouth towards a large white plush toy. They are wearing a delicate gold U-shaped necklace, and the scene has a soft-focus, intimate aesthetic.
A man with short dark hair and wireless earbuds takes a selfie in a gym. He is sitting on black gym equipment, wearing a black t-shirt, with a tattoo visible on his left arm.

A stack of small, professional portrait photos of an East Asian woman with long, straight black hair, a middle part, and a natural makeup look, wearing a black top and a subtle silver necklace, are displayed on a white surface under warm light. One of these photos is held by a hand featuring light-colored nails with white polka dots.

physical_features: Dark hair styled in low buns
Black baseball cap with white text
image_metadata.caption: A person wearing a black activewear-style jacket and a black baseball cap takes a close-up selfie. Their face is partially obscured by a large pretzel-shaped filter, revealing only their eyes and lips with subtle makeup.

physical_features: White and light blue knitted bonnet with ties
image_metadata.caption: A young person with short dark hair, bangs, and half-rim glasses smiles brightly, making a peace sign in a close-up selfie. They are wearing a white knitted bonnet with light blue accents and a light-colored loose-knit top against a plain light green background.
A young woman with long dark wavy hair and bangs takes a close-up selfie. She is looking directly at the camera with a gentle expression while wearing a light-colored knit top.

A person with short dark brown hair and bangs takes a close-up selfie while wearing a dark, ribbed turtleneck sweater with a zipper. The image has a yellow focus box over one eye and a drooling emoji on the sweater.

physical_features: Side braid with red elastic band
Pouty lips with light lip tint

A person with short dark hair and bangs is shown looking up at the camera, making a peace sign gesture. They are casually dressed in all black and appear to be kneeling or sitting in a dimly lit, dark room.
A person with short black hair and clear skin takes a close-up selfie, wearing a white t-shirt. Their face is partially obscured by a playful heart-shaped pretzel filter, with their lips pouting.

physical_features: Thin silver necklace with a small pendant
image_metadata.caption: A young woman with short black hair and bangs poses for a close-up selfie, subtly touching her face. She is wearing a gray cardigan and a thin silver necklace, with a pink heart filter overlaying the image.
A close-up selfie features a person with wavy brown hair and dark brown eyes looking directly at the camera. The background shows a light green wall and white ceiling.

A person with brown hair and bangs takes a mirrored selfie in an elevator, holding a black smartphone that partially obscures their face. They are dressed in a casual short-sleeved plaid shirt over a graphic t-shirt and accessorized with a black crossbody bag featuring a pink character keychain.

physical_features: Short black hair with a fringe
image_metadata.caption: A young man with short black hair and a subtle smile is shown in a close-up shot, wearing a dark grey t-shirt. He is making a hand gesture near his face, possibly in a group setting.

A young woman in a casual red floral dress strikes a playful pose on a sunny city sidewalk. She stands near a large tree, with a distinctive building featuring colorful windows and modern skyscrapers in the background.

A young East Asian woman with straight brown hair and bangs smiles slightly while wearing a black t-shirt with a red heart logo. She has subtle blush on her cheeks and an ear piercing, posed against a plain white background.
A young woman takes a mirrored selfie, showing her long dark wavy hair and a white off-shoulder top with a tie-front detail. She holds a phone with a floral case, reflecting a clear indoor setting.

A person with dark, short hair is seen from behind, squatting next to a black traffic cone on a paved street. They are wearing a maroon t-shirt with white trim and khaki pants, appearing to interact with the cone.

The image displays a hand holding two photo booth strips featuring a young woman on a beach background. The woman has long dark hair with bangs and a side braid, wearing a striped off-the-shoulder top, posing playfully with different animal ear headbands.
This artistic black and white close-up shot features a person's dark eye and short, textured hair. A finger is subtly visible, partially covering the cheek area.

A young woman with short dark brown hair and bangs takes a selfie inside a colorful shop, showcasing a black cropped top and a silver waist chain. She has rosy blush on her cheeks and makes a peace sign with her hand amidst shelves filled with various products.

A person is captured in a dark, low-quality selfie at night, with a blurred building visible in the distant background. The individual wears clear-framed glasses and a white earbud in their right ear.

Gray wristband on a hand in the background

A person with short dark hair, wearing a chic black leather and fur-lined jacket, stands outdoors with their hands raised to obscure their lower face. They are positioned against a light-colored wall, with a street lined with trees and buildings visible under a clear sky in the background.

A young person with short dark hair takes a close-up selfie. They are wearing a dark basic t-shirt in an indoor setting with overhead fluorescent lighting.

A young man with black hair and a clean-shaven face is shown in a medium-quality close-up shot, wearing a grey long-sleeved top. He is posing with his hands near his face, looking directly at the camera with a calm expression.

A close-up selfie captures a person with long, straight black hair, light brown eyes, and subtle makeup featuring rosy cheeks and glossy pink lips. They are wearing a casual light-colored ribbed top, gazing softly towards the camera.
